deployWorld().details: The deployment of the World contract will result in the `WorldDeployed` event being emitted.

returns.worldAddress: The address of the newly deployed World contract.

returns._0: The total number of World contracts deployed by this factory.

worldCount().notice: Returns the total count of deployed World contracts.

documentation.text:
@dev Emitted when a new World contract is deployed.
 @param newContract The address of the newly deployed World contract.

@notice Returns the total count of deployed World contracts.
 @return The total number of World contracts deployed by this factory.
